channel.title: NE News,Assam News on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in NE News,Assam News on NewsStreet

item.title: Goalpara DC calls for non-health sector involvement to eradicate Tuberculosis
item.description: Goalpara DC calls for non-health sector involvement to eradicate Tuberculosis DC of Goalpara Khanindra Choudhury has called for the non-health sector involvement in order to eradicate the Tuberculosis menace from society.

item.title: Minister Ranjit Kumar Dass distributes cheques at Dhubri District Library Auditorium
item.description: Minister Ranjit Kumar Dass distributes cheques at Dhubri District Library Auditorium Minister of Panchayat and Rural Development, Food and Civil Supplies Ranjit Kumar Dass distributed the second phase of cheques

item.title: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Ltd. to donate 9 advanced ambulances
item.description: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Ltd. to donate 9 advanced ambulances ONGC is enhancing access to emergency medical services by adding nine advanced life saving ambulances (ADLS) to the existing logistics (ambulance) fleet of Assam state machinery.

item.title: 8,000 litres of stolen condensate oil seized; 4 arrested in Dibrugarh
item.description: 8,000 litres of stolen condensate oil seized; 4 arrested in Dibrugarh In a crackdown against oil thieves, Dibrugarh police seized 8,000 litres of stolen condensate oil from an oil tanker (AS-05-B-6685) near the Bogibeel bridge in Dibrugarh early on Tuesday.

item.title: Body recovered from Sarengiya Borduwa Bill
item.description: Body recovered from Sarengiya Borduwa Bill A floating body of one Dilip Darjee (34), a resident of Sarke Aati, Bokabil under Sootea Police Station was recovered from Sarengiya Borduwa Bill

item.title: Vigilance Awareness Week observed in Dibrugarh
item.description: Vigilance Awareness Week observed in Dibrugarh Vigilance Awareness Week is observed annually, to create awareness in the minds of every individual about leading a life with absolute integrity and in that process, emphasize the need to combat corruption in public life.

item.title: Huge cache of arms and ammunition recovered in Udalguri district
item.description: Huge cache of arms and ammunition recovered in Udalguri district In a major feat of Assam Police, the police forces recovered a huge cache of arms and ammunitions

item.title: Cheques under AMFIRS distributed among 9,010 borrowers of Lakhimpur district
item.description: Cheques under AMFIRS distributed among 9,010 borrowers of Lakhimpur district Cheques under Assam Micro-Finance Incentive and Relief Scheme (AMFIRS) - 2021-2022, Category-II were distributed among the borrowers of microfinance loans in Lakhimpur district

item.title: Chhath Puja celebrated in Hojai district
item.description: Chhath Puja celebrated in Hojai district In different areas of the Hojai district, devotees observed fasting on the third day of Chhath Puja.

item.title: Cancer awareness programme on the use of tobacco held in Assam's Lakhimpur
item.description: Cancer awareness programme on the use of tobacco held in Assam’s Lakhimpur In association with Assam Cancer Care Foundation (ACCF), organized an awareness programme on the use of tobacco and its relation with cancer and breast cancer.

item.title: Cheques given to 4,668 Micro-Finance Incentive and Relief Scheme (AMFIRS) borrowers in Dhemaji district
item.description: Cheques given to 4,668 Micro-Finance Incentive and Relief Scheme (AMFIRS) borrowers in Dhemaji district The distribution of the cheques under the AMFIRS - 2021-2022, Category-II was formally inaugurated by Sanjay Kishan, the Minister for Tea Tribes and Labour Welfare

item.title: Series of activities for cleaning and disposal matters conducted in Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) Dibrugarh
item.description: Series of activities for cleaning and disposal matters conducted in Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) Dibrugarh The main aim is to create a good work environment and work efficiently for the greater interest of delivering good services to public.

item.title: Orientation programme on National Education Policy 2020 held at Assam's Biswanath College of Education
item.description: Orientation programme on National Education Policy 2020 held at Assam’s Biswanath College of Education The programme was hosted by A Handique, coordinator of CTEF, Biswanath.

item.title: Legendary Assamese cine artiste Nipon Goswami's death condoled
item.description: Legendary Assamese cine artiste Nipon Goswami’s death condoled ANSS, in a press statement issued by Durga Khatiara, president, Dr.

item.title: Vermicompost from banana leaves in Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Tinsukia
item.description: Vermicompost from banana leaves in Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Tinsukia KVK, Tinsukia as a part of Swachhata Campaign under SAP initiated a novel plan to recycle banana leaves for manufacturing of vermicompost during post-Diwali days at the kendra’s production unit.

item.title: Businessman shot at by miscreants in Udalguri district
item.description: Businessman shot at by miscreants in Udalguri district Amidst the Diwali celebration, unidentified masked miscreants shot businessman Gautam Baruah and his wife Bobita Baruah at the latter's residence in the Jalukbari locality of Tangla town

item.title: DAC election: 19 candidates to contest in 5 constituencies of Dhemaji
item.description: DAC election: 19 candidates to contest in 5 constituencies of Dhemaji With October 25 being the last date for the withdrawal of the nomination papers for the Deori Autonomous Council (DAC) Election, 2022

item.title: ACS candidates felicitated in Mangaldai
item.description: ACS candidates felicitated in Mangaldai Various social organizations of Mangaldai including the premier media organization, MMC have greeted and congratulated Dr Jebin Gulnar, the 3rd rank holder in the ACS examination results.

item.title: Overflowing water submerges villages under Kampur revenue circle
item.description: Overflowing water submerges villages under Kampur revenue circle Due to the incessant rains across the State, Karbi Langpi Hydro Electric Power Project released additional water through four sluice gates of the big dam of the power project

item.title: 9 youths of Sonitpur bring laurels by clearing APSC exam
item.description: 9 youths of Sonitpur bring laurels by clearing APSC exam A total of nine candidates in the Sonitpur district have brought laurels to the district by achieving different ranks in the recently declared results of the APSC CCE 2020.
